ascension_planner.title: Genshin Impact Wiki Database
ascension_planner.description: All the best characters and their builds ranked in order of power, viability, and versatility to clear content.
ascension_planner.welcome_desc: Discover character builds, comprehensive guides, and a wiki database all in one place. Genshin-Builds is here to assist you in planning your farming activities with an ascension calculator. Keep track of your progress effortlessly with a convenient todo list. Level up your Genshin Impact experience with this invaluable resource!
ascension_planner.banners_desc: Check out the latest banners and their duration in Genshin Impact.
ascension_planner.latest_posts_desc: Stay up-to-date with the latest news, guides, and tips for Genshin Impact.
ascension_planner.server_timers_desc: The daily reset occurs at 04:00 (4 AM), based on your server's time zone. The weekly reset occurs each Monday, also at 04:00 (4 AM).

character.title: Genshin Impact {name} Rating and Best Builds
character.description: Enhance your Genshin Impact experience with the ultimate builds and top-performing teams for {name}. Unlock in-depth information on their skills, upgrade costs, and much more. Explore now and optimize your gameplay like never before.
character.others_desc: Other artifacts, use the ones with the best stats
character.most_used_title: Most Used Build from the Community
character.most_used_disclaimer: This build is based on the most used artifacts and weapons by the community. If you want to contribute to this data, you can do so by submitting your UID by clicking here.

teams.title: Best Team Comp | Party Building Guide | Genshin Impact
teams.description: This is a guide to making the best party in Genshin Impact. Learn how to make the best party! We introduce the best party composition for each task including exploring areas, slaying field bosses, and more!
teams.detail_title: {name} Team Guide: Mastering Synergy in Genshin Impact
teams.detail_description: Unlock the full potential of your {name} team in Genshin Impact with our comprehensive guide. Discover optimal team compositions, artifact recommendations, and gameplay strategies to dominate in Teyvat.

fishing.title: Genshin Impact Fishing (Fish, Baits, Fishing Rods and Fishing points)
fishing.description: This is an article about the list of fishing spots (points/spots) and the fish that appear in Genshin. The fishing points for Mondstadt, Liyue, Dragon Spine, and Inazuma are also summarized.

calculator.title: Genshin Impact Calculator
calculator.description: Calculate Mora and Materials for Character and Weapon Ascension. Explore Additional Calculators and Tables for In-Game Progression
calculator.character_ascension_calculator_desc: Calculate Mora and Materials for Character Ascension. Optimize Your Character Progression Effortlessly.
calculator.weapon_ascension_calculator_desc: Determine Mora and Materials Required for Weapon Ascension. Enhance Your Weapons Wisely with Our Tool.
calculator.resin_calculator_desc: Manage Your Resin Efficiently with Our Genshin Impact Resin Calculator. Plan Your Gameplay and Rewards.
calculator.friendship_exp_calculator_desc: Calculate Friendship EXP and Strengthen Your Bonds with Characters. Maximize Your Gaming Experience.
calculator.fate_price_calculator_desc: Estimate the Cost of Fate in Genshin Impact. Plan Your Gacha Strategy with Our Calculator.
calculator.fate_count_calculator_desc: Keep Track of Your Fate Count and Ensure a Rewarding Gacha Experience. Use Our Calculator for Precision.
calculator.calculateByFate: Calculate how much money I need for {fate}
calculator.randomEvents: How many Random Events do you farm everyday?
calculator.friendship_result: To reach Friendship level 10, if you complete all daily commissions and use 180 resin everyday
calculator.serenitea_result: If you also place the character in the Serenitea Pot (Max Adeptal Energy)

tcg_cards.title: Genius Invokation TCG Card Game
tcg_cards.description: Genius Invokation TCG is a new card game feature in Genshin Impact. Guide includes what is the Genius Invocation TCG, character card game, how to get cards!

tcg_card.title: {name} - Genshin Impact TCG Card List
tcg_card.description: {name} is a card for Genshin Impact Genius Invokation TCG. See how to get , skills, effects, how to get, and more of {name} Card for Genius Invokation.

tcg_decks.title: Discover the Top Decks in Genius Invokation TCG: Meta Builds for Genshin Impact Card Game
tcg_decks.description: This article provides a comprehensive list of the best decks in the TCG, Genius Invokation. It includes the meta builds for Genshin Impact's card game, making it the ultimate guide for players looking to improve their gameplay and climb the ranks. With this information, readers can stay up-to-date on the current meta and make informed decisions when building their own decks.

tcg_deck_builder.title: Genius Invokation TCG Deck Builder
tcg_deck_builder.description: Create your own deck for the Genius Invokation TCG. Choose your cards and build your deck to play against other players or to share with your friends or the community.
tcg_deck_builder.max_character_cards_error: You can't add more than 3 characters to your deck
tcg_deck_builder.min_character_cards_error: You need to add at least 3 characters to your deck
tcg_deck_builder.max_non_character_cards_error: You can't add more than 30 non-character cards to your deck
tcg_deck_builder.min_non_character_cards_error: You need to add at least 30 non-character cards to your deck
tcg_deck_builder.share_title: Check out my GCG deck on Genshin Builds
tcg_deck_builder.limitation_awareness: Please be aware that the deck builder is still in beta and may have some limitations. If you encounter any issues, please let us know.
tcg_deck_builder.min_cards_simulator: ℹ️ You need to have at least 6 non-character cards to try Draw Simulator.

changelog.title: Genshin Impact {version} Update: Latest Features, Changes, and Improvements
changelog.description: Discover all the new adventures in Genshin Impact {version}! Our comprehensive guide covers the latest features, character updates, and gameplay enhancements. Stay ahead in Teyvat with the newest version's detailed changelog.
changelog.changelog: Explore the Exciting New Features in Genshin Impact Version {version}
changelog.changelog_description: A detailed look into the enhancements and additions that Version {version} brings to your Genshin Impact experience, including new characters, quests, and gameplay mechanics.
